NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The Product Store is a fully-featured product stock based application with many more features.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the Product Store
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Register with a new account and login with the credentials entered. Add your items with all the flexible fields to track the details later. You can also share the item in social media and let people know about your search.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Need help? Check out the Product Store README for a full tutorial
WELCOME_INTRO: Take a step towards your new generation app
